content:
Sure, here are some suggestions and action items for each developer/client:

1. Client: C2
Developer: Cyril Lonsido
Action item: Schedule a one-on-one meeting with Cyril to discuss his concerns and explore possible options for transferring to a different client with a better work environment. We can also offer him additional support and resources to manage stress and cope with the current work situation.
2. Client: BlueFrog
Developer: Paul Gravos
Action item: Coordinate with our training department to arrange a proper training or workshop program for Paul to help him develop his skills in back-end development. Additionally, we can communicate with the client to explore the possibility of finding a replacement for Jasper to ease the workload of the developers.
3. Client: Pastest
Developer: John Gela
Action item: Discuss with John the specific training and workshop opportunities available to enhance his knowledge and skills in Angular development. We can coordinate with the training department to arrange a formal training program for John that is tailored to his specific needs.
4. Client: Knights Absorb
Developer: Joshua Osillo
Action item: Reach out to Joshua to assess his current proficiency in using Figma and determine what additional resources or training he may need to continue to develop his design skills. We can also offer him a comprehensive training program to help him acquire new skills relevant to his work.
5. Client: Bluebay
Developer: Albert Gaya
Action item: Upgrade Albert's laptop storage to the requested amount to ensure he has the necessary tools and resources to do his job effectively.
6. Client: Evoke
Developer: Jonel Catapang
Action item: Follow up with Jonel to determine if he can commit to working part-time and if there is any support he needs to balance his work and personal life. We can offer him additional training opportunities or rescheduling of his work hours to meet his needs.
7. Client: Redbox
Developer: Jaerome
Action item: Explore additional training and skill development opportunities for Jaerome to help him acquire new design skills to support his current and future projects. We can offer him support, coaching, and mentoring to help him overcome his current struggles in design work.
